course.subject: ISOM
course.name: Blockchain Applications in Decentralized Finance
course.description: This course discusses blockchain, also known as distributed ledger technology (DLT), and its business applications in the world of decentralized finance (DeFi). The course not only provide a basic understanding of blockchain/DLT, but students will also learn about different DeFi companies and able to develop their own DeFi business models after the program.
